rComments: Ted is a concise and clear lecturer but unfortunately he does rely a little too much on the book. Attendance was mandatory for summer session but  if you attended it was an easy 10% of the grade. Grading was as follows: Attendance 10%, Homework 30%, Weekly Quizzes 30%, Comprehensive Final Exam 30%

Ted is a nice guy, but his teaching method leaves a lot to be desired. He copies from the book and rewrites it on the board, literally. Attendance is mandatory, which makes the class feel pointless, as you could just read the book.  He is fair with HW, quizzes, & tests. I had him for summer session, his teaching may be different in regular quarter.
